entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
